name: Bacon Cheeseburger Skillet

instructions.en: Brown ground beef and bacon in a large skillet or wok; drain grease.
instructions.sk: Na veľkej panvici alebo vo woku opečte mleté mäso a slaninu; zlejte mastnotu.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンまたはワックで挽肉とベーコンを炒めて茶色くし、脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Stir in ketchup, mustard, pickles, salt, and pepper.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte kečup, horčicu, nakladané uhorky, soľ a korenie.
instructions.ja: ケチャップ、マスタード、ピクルス、塩、コショウを加えて混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add cheese cubes and heat until cheese starts to melt but isn't fully incorporated.
instructions.sk: Pridajte kocky syra a zahrejte, kým sa syr nezačne topiť, ale nie je úplne zapracovaný.
instructions.ja: チーズキューブを加え、チーズが溶け始めるまで加熱しますが、完全に混ざらないようにします。

instructions.en: Just before serving, stir in onion and tomato.
instructions.sk: Tesne pred podávaním vmiešajte cibuľu a paradajku.
instructions.ja: 提供直前に玉ねぎとトマトを加えて混ぜます。

notes: Makes 6 servings. For crispier bacon, brown it separately before adding beef. You can use 1/4 cup dill pickle relish instead of chopped pickles. Consider adding extra condiments for stronger flavors. The fresh onion and tomato add a nice pop of flavor.
